name: Puppet Master (Pedro Marques, Afonso Lage, Miguel Martinho)
name_original: Puppet Master (Pedro Marques, Afonso Lage, Miguel Martinho)
description:
Puppet Master is a game where you control a marionette with your hands by using a leap motion controller. The objective is to imitate the positions of the puppets that are coming towards you. You can play the game with keyboard but we strongly recommend you to play it with a leap motion device.

This game was developed by:

Pedro Marques - https://pmarques93.itch.io/
Afonso Lage - https://afonso-lage.itch.io/
Luiz Santos - https://jundmaster.itch.io/
Pedro Coutinho - https://pedro-coutinho.itch.io/
Miguel Martinho - https://miguel-martinho.itch.io/

Game DesignerProgrammerArtistSound Designer
